scripts.build: tsc --build && yarn gen && cd project && mvn -version && mvn -B deploy -D altDeploymentRepository=local::default::file://${PWD}/../maven-repo --settings=user.xml -Dhttp.keepAlive=false -Dmaven.wagon.http.pool=false
scripts.dist-clean: rm -rf dist maven-repo && cd project && mvn -B clean --settings=user.xml
scripts.test: echo 'Tests are run as part of the build target'
